It is the 5th largest car maker in [[India]] after [[Maruti Suzuki]], [[Hyundai Motor India Limited|Hyundai]], [[Tata Motors|Tata]] and [[Mahindra & Mahindra Limited|Mahindra]]. ==History== [[File:2nd Chevrolet Aveo.jpg|thumb|right|The Daewoo Kalos is sold as the Chevrolet Aveo in India.]] [[File:Chevrolet Kalos front.JPG|thumb|right|The [[Daewoo Kalos]] is sold as the Chevrolet Aveo U-VA in India.]] [[Chevrolet]] came to India in 1928. An office was set up in [[Bombay]] with an [[Factory|assembly plant]] constructed in [[Sewree]]. [[General Motors]] was the first automobile company to open an assembly plant in [[India]]. Vehicle Production started in 1928 with the [[National Series AB Touring]]. In 1952-53 the âsocialistâ Indian Government forced [[General Motors India Private Limited|General Motors India]] to shut shop, along with other foreign car companies.{{cite web|url=http://www.chevrolet.co.in/content_data/AP/IN/en/GBPIN/001/BRANDSITE/chevrolet-in-india.html |title=Chevrolet in India |publisher=Chevrolet.co.in |date= |accessdate=2011-04-18}} However in 2003 ''Chevrolet Sales India Private Limited'' was established and the Chevrolet brand was re-launched in India. It replaced [[Opel India Private Limited|Opel]] as the only brand offering by [[General Motors India Private Limited]]. ==Manufacturing facilities== [[File:Chevroletspark.jpg|thumb|right|The [[Daewoo Matiz]] (M250) is sold as the Chevrolet Spark in India.]] [[File:Chevrolet Captiva front.JPG|thumb|right|The [[Daewoo Winstorm]] is sold as the Chevrolet Captiva in India.]] CSIPL operates vehicle manufacturing plants in [[Halol]], [[Gujarat]] and [[Talegaon Dabhade]], [[Maharastra]], It maintains headquarters in [[Halol]] and [[Gurgaon]] and a large technical center in [[Bangalore]]. Its Halol and Talegaon Dabhade manufacturing plants have a combined production capacity of 385,000 vehicles annually.{{cite web|url=http://www.chevrolet.co.in/content_data/AP/IN/en/GBPIN/001/BRANDSITE/GM-India-Confidence.html |title=GM India Confidence |publisher=Chevrolet.co.in |date= |accessdate=2011-04-18}} ==Models== Many of CSIPL's vehicles sold in India are imported from [[GMDAT]] either as completely built units, or assembled with varying degree of localized manufacturing. CSIPL currently sells three [[hatchback]]s, three [[Sedan (automobile)|sedan]]s, one [[MUV]] and One [[SUV]].
